alert.note: Alert for Northeast Mountains; Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 5:07AM PST until January 22 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of North Idaho and Central, North Central, and Northeast Washington. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Be prepared for winter driving conditions this morning. By this afternoon the majority of northeast and north central Washington as well as far north Idaho will warm into the mid 30s.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Idaho, for the latest road information in Idaho, call 5 1 1. In Washington, for the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel

area.areaDesc: Northeast Mountains; Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area
